title: Introducing: Spyology Squad
itunes:title: Introducing: Spyology Squad
description:
Hi, Daniel and Jorge fans! If the children in your life are as curious as you are, we have the perfect podcast for them. Spyology Squad is an adventurous and educational podcast for kids 6-12 who love science and solving problems. Check out the trailer to see if this show is what the little ones you love will enjoy!

Show description: Packed with adventure every week! In Spyology Squad, you’ll follow Jayden, Ava, and Mr. Jim as they work to defeat Dr. Stinkybreath and his Purple Ninjas! Every week we’ll learn all about a new subject in science, have fun, and save the world together! 

Listen and subscribe to Spyology Squad on the iHeartRadio app or wherever you get your podcasts!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
